description.value: Upon reaching 20th level, you become one with the spirits. You become immune to death effects, exhaustion, fatigue, nausea, negative levels, and the sickened condition. You can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{Astral Projection} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{True Seeing} once per day as spell-like abilities without requiring material components. Should you die, you rise again 2d4 days later as a ghost.
